backend/BatsmanPerformance.mo: Defines a BatsmanPerformance record with batting statistics such as runs, balls faced, and boundaries.
backend/BowlerPerformance.mo: Defines a BowlerPerformance record containing bowling metrics including overs, maidens, runs conceded, and wickets.
backend/FielderPerformance.mo: Defines a FielderPerformance record with fielding stats like catches, stumpings, and dismissals.
backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining domain types for players, teams, matches, scorecards, auctions, and views with authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to frontend files, components, and tests with high-confidence mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing routing, pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/.ic-assets.json5: Asset configuration specifying caching rules and content types for deployment on the Internet Computer.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining path-based routing, SPA hosting requirements, and troubleshooting for blank screens.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-driven stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and base theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with dark mode, boot error fallback UI, and scripts for early error capture in production.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup using path-based routing, global error handling, profile setup modal, and legacy hash upgrade.
frontend/src/components/AdminHeader.tsx: Header showing admin info with login/logout handling and navigation.
frontend/src/components/AuctionSummary.t: Displays team auction statistics and detailed summaries with CSV export support.
frontend/src/components/BallByBallEditor: Editor for adding and updating ball‑by‑ball cricket match data including innings, overs, and ball outcomes.
frontend/src/components/CrashFallbackScr: Full‑screen crash UI showing error details with options to refresh or view diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorProvid: Context provider that captures fatal errors and renders the crash fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that logs errors and displays the crash fallback screen on failure.
frontend/src/components/LeadingTeamIndic: Visual badge indicating the currently leading team.
frontend/src/components/MatchInningsScor: UI for editing batsman and bowler performance per innings with authentication gating.
Admin UI for creating, editing, publishing, and managing matches including score, innings, and shareable links.
frontend/src/components/PlayerAuctionDia: Dialog for running live player auctions, handling bid placement, increments, start/stop, and assignment.
frontend/src/components/PlayerManagement: CRUD interface for players with team assignments, auctions, and price management.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Simple modal for saving the caller’s profile name using a form submission.
frontend/src/components/PublicBallByBall: Displays grouped ball‑by‑ball data by innings and over with latest ball highlighting.
frontend/src/components/PublicInningsCon: Shows current innings context including players, over progress, and last‑ball details.
frontend/src/components/SafeNotFoundRedi: Redirects unknown routes to home without showing a 404 page.
frontend/src/components/TeamBoughtPlayer: Lists players purchased by a team with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/TeamHeader.tsx: Renders a team header with logo, team name, remaining purse, and login/logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/TeamManagement.t: Provides UI to create teams, edit team purse and name, and access owners and bought players management.
frontend/src/components/TeamMatches.tsx: Displays matches, filtering by team if provided, and shows match details, scores, and win/loss badges.
frontend/src/components/TeamOwnersManage: Manages team owners, allowing adding/removing principals and editing owner display names.
frontend/src/components/TournamentFixtur: Generates and previews round-robin tournament fixtures, validating teams and allowing fixture creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks to fetch and mutate backend data such as players, teams, user profiles, roles, and match-related information via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page showing player, team, match, auction, and tournament management tabs, using identity and profile data to display user info.
frontend/src/pages/DebugPage.tsx: Diagnostics page displaying backend actor status, user role fetch results, and runtime debug information.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page enabling Internet Identity login and redirecting users based on profile data, with optional public navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Deprecated empty placeholder component for old 404 handling.
frontend/src/pages/PublicScorecardPage.t: Displays a public cricket scorecard with live data, player name mapping, sharing options, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboardPage.tsx: Renders a team dashboard showing team data, purse details, players, and a selector when no profile team is set.
frontend/src/utils/ballByBall.ts: Provides helpers to derive innings context, group balls by innings/over, and identify the latest ball from ball‑by‑ball data.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Generates and downloads a CSV file containing auction summaries for all teams.
frontend/src/utils/globalErrorHandling.t: Sets up global window error and unhandled rejection handlers with contextual logging and callback support.
frontend/src/utils/roundRobin.ts: Generates round‑robin fixtures by creating unique team pairings with assigned round numbers.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeDebugInfo.ts: Collects and logs runtime environment and URL details for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/shareLinks.ts: Builds public share URLs and provides clipboard and Web Share API helpers for link sharing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions (colors, radius, shadows), animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, including routing-related issues, existing and new feature requests, and notes about fixing SPA navigation and removing unexpected 404 pages.
